H0.text: Nicknamed 'Robo Cop' when a policeman, Ray Mallon is the directly elected Mayor of which town. Middlesbrough

H1.text: Nicknamed 'Robo Cop' when a policeman, Ray Mallon is the directly elected Mayor of which town. Hartlepool

H2.text: Nicknamed 'Robo Cop' when a policeman, Ray Mallon is the directly elected Mayor of which town. Stoke-on-Trent

H3.text: Nicknamed 'Robo Cop' when a policeman, Ray Mallon is the directly elected Mayor of which town. Ironopolis

A4.text: Ray Mallon was the independent Mayor of Middlesbrough from 2002 to 2015.
